QuestData.Title: Making Introductions
QuestData.Description:
<As Sansok Khan signs, Okir vocalizes for her.>
It has been countless generations since an outsider like you reached our lands. With Primalists treading on our lands and peddling forbidden magics, my people are understandably wary.
If you are to travel with us, you must make yourself known. Introduce yourself to the members of my clan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Introduce yourself to members of Clan Shikaar.
QuestData.RewardText: The rest of our attending clan has already traveled to Maruukai to prepare our site. The caravan from this outpost will be the last to arrive.
